title: RuneGlaive Alternative for CDR please ? C: for tanky AP junglers
body:
Hi, sorry I couldn't phrase my title properly.

I used to enjoy jungling with tanky ap champs like Amumu, Sejuani and Nautilus with the previous blue enchantment for the jungle item, I can't recall it's name, because it would build out of Fiendish Codex and give Cooldown Reduction which I found really useful for those champs because their ultimates have long cooldowns. And with such large Crowd Control ults, it's effective in making game-changing plays. It's sad that I can't build it anymore and because I tend to go fully tank to peel and support the rest of the team, I cannot swap out a defensive item for another CDR item. 

As fun as the new Runeglaive is and the joy of openning up more possibilities for ap junglers, I would really appreciate a 5th enchantment like the previous blue enchantment for some CDR for AP junglers who are there to tank/CC and not be bursty/skill spammers like NIdalee/Fizz/Ezreal and the like. 

Thanks.
